StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetNonWorkingDays]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@OrgID uniqueidentifier, @RecruiterID uniqueidentifier, @Year int, @Month int
AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT [Organiza.onId] ,[RecruiterID] ,[Date] FROM USMC.NonWorkingDay WHERE Organiza.onId= @OrgID AND (RecruiterID=@RecruiterID OR (@RecruiterID <> '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' AND RecruiterID='00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' )) AND YEAR(Date) = @Year AND MONTH(Date) = @Month ORDER BY Date
END
